articles.author: Lily Kuo
articles.title: China puts tariffs on U.S. farm goods, blacklists American companies - The Washington Post
articles.description: Beijing retaliated quickly after Trump further raised tariffs on Chinese goods, a major escalation in the trade war between the world’s two largest economies.
articles.content: China imposed tariffs of up to 15 percent on a raft of U.S. farm products on Tuesday and blacklisted more than 20 U.S. companies, marking a major escalation in a brewing trade war between the worlds … [+5216 chars]
